text: In the ECS Inspector - Reprocessing Groups page, click on the Search Reprocessing Group and Error UDR Type Columns (search bar) and enter a text sequence that can be found in the name of the Reprocessing Group or Error UDR Type you are looking for. The page will dynamically filter the results based on your search input.
title: ECS - Searching for a Reprocessing Group - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
